title: 这个报错求大佬看看
txt_content:
[20:14:28 WARN]: java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_IOERR]  Some kind of disk I/O error occurred (disk I/O error)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.DB.execute(DB.java:342)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.DB.executeUpdate(DB.java:363)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.executeUpdate(PrepStmt.java:85)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.database.Database.insertCommand(Database.java:388)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.database.Logger.log_command(Logger.java:71)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processPlayerCommand(Process.java:357)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:107)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:48)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[20:14:28 WARN]: java.sql.SQLException: cannot commit - no transaction is active
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.NativeDB.throwex(NativeDB.java:210)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.NativeDB._exec(Native Method)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at org.sqlite.Stmt.executeUpdate(Stmt.java:152)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.database.Database.commitTransaction(Database.java:190)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:139)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:48)
[20:14:28 WARN]:        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

无缘无故出来，然后服务器变卡顿还有时候崩溃

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
请问储存空间是否充足？
建议清理coreprotect数据库
崩出的不是一条而是连崩出来很多条
